examples.korean: Racism has been a scar on the game. 발음듣기 인종차별주의가 그 경기의 이미지를 손상시켜 왔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Racism has been a scar on the game. 발음

examples.korean: Sugar is the destroyer of healthy teeth. 발음듣기 설탕은 건강한 치아를 손상시키는 주범이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Sugar is the destroyer of healthy teeth. 발음

examples.korean: to cause irreparable damage/harm to your health 발음듣기 건강에 회복할 수 없는 손상/해를 입히다 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: to cause irreparable damage/harm to your health 발음

examples.korean: He was very bruised and suffering from whiplash. 발음듣기 그는 심한 타박상과 목뼈 손상을 입고 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He was very bruised and suffering from whiplash. 발음

examples.korean: He suffered permanent disfigurement in the fire. 발음듣기 그는 그 화재로 영구적인 외모 손상을 입었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He suffered permanent disfigurement in the fire. 발음
